title: Lissandra nerf
body:
Lissandra
Ice Shard (Q) damage lowered to 70/100/130/160/190 from 75/110/145/180/215

WHATS THE TRUTH RIOT. Give her more slow on her q in that case or lower the mana cost on that spell.

replies.body:
Riot can't decide if she's OP or underpowered. Earlier they wanted to give her a shield, now they want to nerf her damage. Riot, you can't fix all your problems by lowering the damage. ESPECIALLY ON THE SHORT RANGE SKILLSHOT YOU NEED TO AIM THROUGH MINIONS IN ORDER TO KEEP A REMOTELY SAFE DISTANCE.

Sigh...
Inb4 Liss haters downvote you to death and cry about how OP she is.

I think he's actually countering the fact she deserved that nerf and that in reality Riot would compensate for it better than they compensate for heroes that actually got nerfed indirectly, such as Veigar or Morde and got 'compensated' for it.

Remember when I said Lissandra was freelo for the past year?


>~~#~~GuttheFreeloWitch
